Literature.Title: A mycobacteriophage-derived trehalose-6,6'-dimycolate-binding peptide containing both antimycobacterial and anti-inflammatory abilities.
Literature.Author: Wei L, Wu J, Liu H, Yang H, Rong M, Li D, Zhang P, Han J, Lai R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC90=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592(MIC=150µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 08A865(MIC=175µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 08A875(MIC=>200µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=125µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=150µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=100-175µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 08031014(MIC=150µg/ml)
